creator: Hoopow
descriptionHtml:
Awlad school est un logiciel d’apprentissage de la langue arabe destiné aux débutants.
Entièrement illustré par le Studio BDouin, il dispose d’atouts inédits dans le domaine de l’apprentissage en ligne :
- Des minis tests interactifs
- Des leçons en format Bande dessinée (!). Efficace pour l’apprentissage en immersion
- Des minis histoires ludiques, pour accrocher l’attention des jeunes étudiants
- Des dialogues sonorisés et joués par des comédiens professionnels
Déjà plus de 4000 écrans disponibles pour maîtriser l’apprentissage de la lecture, l’écriture et des premières bases du dialogue en arabe !
Note : La méthode est développée sous la supervision d’un directeur pédagogique titulaire d’une Ijaza, certifiant de sa mémorisation des 7 différents types de lecture du Coran, et diplômé des langues à l’Université de la Sorbonne.
NOUVEAU : Grâce au soutien de nos partenaires, la méthode devient 100% gratuite !
A votre tour, n’hésitez pas à nous soutenir en parlant de l’application autour de vous et en nous laissant un joli commentaire : )
PS : Certaines rubriques de l’application sont encore en développement. Merci de votre patience !
descriptionShort: Autonomous and interactive software to learn in a fun way

3, rue des Girondins
L-1626 Luxembourg
Grand Duché du Luxembourg

title: Awlad School

container.value:
3, rue des Girondins
L-1626 Luxembourg
Grand Duché du Luxembourg

creator: Hoopow
descriptionHtml:
Awlad School is an arabic language learning software made for beginners.
Fully illustrated by the BDouin Studio, it has unique features in the realm of digital learning :
- Interactive mini-assessments
- Lessons in Cartoon format (!). Effective for immersive learning
- Fun mini-stories, to catch young student's attention
- Voiced dialogues played by professional comedians
Already more than 4000 screens available to learn reading, writing and the first basics of dialogue in arabic!
Note: The method is developed under the supervision of an educational director holding an Ijaza, certifying his memorization of the 7 different types of reading of the Qur'an, and a degree in languages from the University of Sorbonne in France.
NEW : Thanks to the support of our partners, the method is now 100% free!
Feel free to support us by talking about the app around you and leaving a beautiful review : )
PS : Some sections of the app are under active development. Thanks for your patience!
descriptionShort: Learn arabic in a fun and autonomous way

appDetails.developerAddress:
3, rue des Girondins
L-1626 Luxembourg
Grand Duché du Luxembourg
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Awlad School V2 is here!

What's new?
- A section to learn & memorize new vocabulary
- A unique software to test your pronunciation and have it corrected by real reviewers
- A mini-game to practice with fun
- A new ergonomic home page

IMPORTANT:
You can now subscribe.
But don't worry! 90% of the app remains FREE :)
So why subscribe?

- To financially support the project
- To access additional features
- To compensate the team of reviewers

Feel free to subscribe and join the Awlad community!

...and among our Premium subscribers : )

creator: Hoopow
descriptionHtml:
Awlad School is an arabic language learning software made for beginners.
Fully illustrated by the BDouin Studio, it has unique features in the realm of digital learning :
- Interactive mini-assessments
- Lessons in Cartoon format (!). Effective for immersive learning
- Fun mini-stories, to catch young student's attention
- Voiced dialogues played by professional comedians
Already more than 4000 screens available to learn reading, writing and the first basics of dialogue in arabic!
Note: The method is developed under the supervision of an educational director holding an Ijaza, certifying his memorization of the 7 different types of reading of the Qur'an, and a degree in languages from the University of Sorbonne in France.
NEW : Thanks to the support of our partners, the method is now 100% free!
Feel free to support us by talking about the app around you and leaving a beautiful review : )
PS : Some sections of the app are under active development. Thanks for your patience!
descriptionShort: Learn arabic in a fun and autonomous way
